meanings.sent1: The tree in our backyard is climbable for the kids.
meanings.sent2: The mountain had a clear path that was climbable for experienced hikers.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a climbable bookshelf to escape the playful puppy.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as climbable as the highest peak, never giving up.
meanings.sent5: The ladder was so climbable, it made reaching the roof seem easy.

meanings.definition: Capable of being ascended by climbing.
meanings.sent1: The rock wall was not very climbable due to its slippery surface.
meanings.sent2: The staircase was steep but still climbable with some effort.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a climbable skyscraper for exercise seemed both fun and challenging.
meanings.sent4: His spirits were as climbable as the tallest tower, always looking up.
meanings.sent5: The vines on the wall made it look more climbable than it actually was.
